concept.title: 52.219-4 Notice of Price Evaluation Preference for HUBZone Small Business Concerns.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 19.1309(b)(1), insert the following clause:
Notice of Price Evaluation preference for HUBZone Small Business Concerns (Mar 2020)

li.p: (a) Definitions. See 13 CFR 126.103 for the definition of HUBZone.
